title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
created_time: September 30, 2023, 08:39:27 AMLast edit: September 30, 2023, 10:30:52 AM by EluguHcman
content: Greetings to everyone. Please I want to bring about the season "independence day" where our govt and nationality has thought us that 1st of Octobers is our national independence day way be say we don stand strong keep the colonials rulership away to have come to achieve this our sovereignty and autonomy freedom of today.Abeg eehh... I creat this thread for safety sake not of any excitement of wetin our govt dey try inspire us say na ceremonial of independence.Lie lie. I non know if any of una ever reason am say our way far past leaders been dey on a selfish interests by calling for this independence movement too early? because if them been Conciously settled to diversify their mentally reasonings in terms of great development and achievement for the nation, we for learn better on governance for better lives than today.Our way far past leaders were too eager & desperate to take the lead of governance by Â asking our colonial the British to go so hastenly by calling for her independence thinking say them don learn finish na him make we still dey this setback since 1960 despite our blessings of natural resources and individual possessions (creativity/talents).Essential reasons for this threadMy foresight point of creating this thread is to alert us all about "Seasonal Scammers" out of this season of "independence celebration".We all know say our 9ja local scammers dey mostly target at ceremonial seasons to get in the air roaming around the internets, disguising themselves and claiming to be 1 or 2 govt and private companies/organizations that tends to do "give away and also giving chances to the masses to be beneficiaries of its opportunities to great explorations especially to "financial gains & freedoms" all in the name of the seasonal ceremony "happy Independence day".Some are also disguise to "goods and services promos" with terms & conditions applied (Limited timing) just to magnetise and hastings victims to fall.Make una always remember say na mostly big eyes and greeds dey cost person (s) fall scamming victims. So... Be warned and be at alert cus scammers go full the internet labor market this Happy Independence Day season just as their usuals with their sugarcoated words of attractions.No also forget say your BTC na digital currency on a digital investment way get to do with internet bcos this people Operates on internet diversifications.
